alert.note: Alert for Western Mojave Desert (California) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS LasVegas (Southern Nevada, Southeastern California, Northwestern Arizona)
info.headline: Wind Advisory issued June 03 at 3:47PM PDT until June 05 at 12:00AM PDT by NWS LasVegas
info.description: ...WIND ADVISORY REMAINS IN EFFECT FROM 4 PM SATURDAY TO MIDNIGHT PDT SATURDAY NIGHT... * WHAT...Southwest winds 25 to 35 mph with gusts up to 55 mph expected. * WHERE...Western Mojave Desert. * WHEN...From 4 PM Saturday to midnight PDT Saturday night. * IMPACTS...Gusty winds could blow around unsecured objects. Tree limbs could be blown down and a few power outages may result. Patchy blowing dust could reduce visibility on area roadways.
info.instruction: Use extra caution when driving, especially if operating a high profile vehicle. Secure outdoor objects.
